Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is truly a testament to excellence and can significantly enhance your daily experience. Considering its craftsmanship and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $200 for this product. I believe this offer reflects its true worth and provides you with an opportunity to enjoy its benefits without compromising on quality. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
